item.description:
Questions on the docket:

1. Should schoolchildren be exposed to religious books in public school libraries?
Cf. http://www.bocaratonn....
2. Should atheists come out of the closet? (and if so, who will guard the coats?)
Cf. http://www.mercurynew...
3. Should Hitchens be annointed Godless Gadfly and Goodfellow of the Year, or of the Decade? That irascible charmer.
Cf. http://www.washington....

How will you find us? Look for the crimson A on our table signs.

I'd like seriously to talk about organization goals of Boston Atheists -- who would like to manage a news list; who would like to undertake the search for a location for the BA library; what sort of events we'd like to be doing, and where.
item.name: The Boston Atheists July Meetup
